content.title: Visceral Artery Aneurysms Overview
content.description: Aneurysms of the celiac, mesenteric, and hepatic circulation. Splenic artery aneurysms most common, followed by hepatic. Often discovered incidentally.
content.key_point: True aneurysms have lower rupture risk than pseudoaneurysms. Pseudoaneurysms require urgent treatment regardless of size.
